Articles.Content:
Kerbin Clouds would be cool. Its a polish feature, so not a priority at the present time, but hopefully considered at a later date.

Note: Sorry if this suggestion has been brought up, conducted a quick search, did not see anything in suggestions.

I commend you for using the search function, however weather features are on the "what not to suggest" list on the main Suggestions and Development page

You may want to have a look here for information on something relevant - http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/44135-0-21-x-Universe-Replacer/page17

I'd rather there's no clouds as long as there's performance optimisation remaining to be done. The rendering and physics involved with their movement would cause a serious performance impact.

It's not for nothing that in MS Flight Sim cloud and weather data was only calculated and rendered in a relatively small area around your aircraft, KSP would have to continuously calculate it for at least half the celestial body the craft is seeing/influenced by.
